overview:
IOUserAudioStream  GetLatency Instance MethodGetLatencyDriverKit 21.0+uint32_t GetLatency();Return ValueReturns uint32_t

Get the latency of the stream in sample frames.

Getting the value will be synchronized using the work queue created by the object.

# GetLatency | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AudioDriverKit ](/documentation/audiodriverkit)

- [ IOUserAudioStream ](/documentation/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiostream)

-  GetLatency 

Instance Method# GetLatency

DriverKit 21.0+

```
uint32_t GetLatency();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/GetLatency#return-value)

Returns uint32_t

## [Discussion](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/GetLatency#discussion)

Get the latency of the stream in sample frames.

Getting the value will be synchronized using the work queue created by the object.
